author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
One giant solar storm could change life as we know it. A Coronal Mass Ejection (CME) could wipe out electricity, communication, and infrastructure. 
Let’s hope we notice it in time.

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science #solarflares #solarflare #space
